description: "GitHub issue label configuration, label taxonomy, workflow automation mapping."
tier: Alfred
allowed-tools: "Read, Bash"
---

## What It Does

GitHub issue label 종류, 사용 규칙, workflow 자동화 연결을 정의합니다.

## When to Use

- ✅ Issue 생성 시 label 선택
- ✅ Label 워크플로우 이해

---

Learn more in `reference.md`.
